entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 12:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
